item.title: 纽伯格警告国债收益率将 "持续 "走高
item.description: Neuberger Berman 警告不要逢低买入美国国债，称最近的抛售可能是收益率 "出人意料地持续 "走高的开始。【原文：Neuberger Berman warned against buying US Treasury bonds on dips, saying the recent selloff could be the beginning of a “surprisingly sustained” move higher in yields.】

item.title: Wealthsimple 首席执行官称加拿大生产力落后是一场 "危机
item.description: Wealthsimple Inc. 的负责人称加拿大的生产力问题是一场 "绝对的危机"，需要企业界的大力推动才能解决。【原文：The head of Wealthsimple Inc. called Canada’s productivity problem an “absolute crisis” that will take a major entrepreneurial push to fix.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦从航空公司股权出售候选名单中获得一份投标书
item.description: 由于其他五家财团没有参与巴基斯坦的一次重要私有化尝试，巴基斯坦只收到了一份对国家航空公司股份的竞标。【原文：Pakistan received just one bid for a stake in the national carrier as five other consortiums stayed away from one of the country’s major privatization attempts.】

item.title: 大型科技股期权显示投资者在盈利前保持冷静
item.description: 期权市场对本周科技巨头财报日走势的定价与过去的波动基本一致，投资者对防范大跌的需求有限。【原文：Options markets are pricing earnings-day moves for tech giants reporting this week that are largely in line with past swings, with investors showing limited demand for protection against selloffs.】

item.title: 大跌使国债市场步入两年来最糟糕的一个月
item.description: 在喜忧参半的美国经济数据公布后，国债有望创下两年多来最差的一个月，继续保持跌势。【原文：Treasuries are on track for their worst month in more than two years, holding onto their declines after a mixed reading of US economic data.】

item.title: 与沙特财富基金老板结怨多年后，马斯克在 FII 发表演讲
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在沙特阿拉伯的 "未来投资倡议"（Future Investment Initiative）上出人意料地虚拟亮相，此举表明这位亿万富翁已经与沙特阿拉伯王国修复了关系，在此之前，双方曾在马斯克将特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Elon Musk made a surprise virtual appearance at Saudi Arabia’s Future Investment Initiative in a move that indicated the billionaire has mended relations with the kingdom after the two sides fell out during his short-lived effort to take Tesla Inc. private.】

item.title: 苹果缩小 Mac Mini，这是 Mac Mini 自 2010 年以来的首次改版
item.description: 苹果公司约 15 年来首次全面改进了 Mac mini 台式电脑的设计，将其尺寸缩小到 5 英寸，并增加了速度更快的 M4 芯片。【原文：Apple Inc. overhauled the design of its Mac mini desktop computer for the first time in about 15 years, cutting the device’s size to 5 inches across and adding speedier M4 chips.】

item.title: 以太坊联合创始人的公司 Consensys 裁员 20
item.description: 以太坊网络软件供应商 Consensys Inc. 将裁撤 162 个职位，占其员工总数的 20%。【原文：Consensys Inc., a software provider for the Ethereum network, is eliminating 162 positions, or 20% of its workforce.】

item.title: 新兴市场迫在眉睫的债务螺旋考验国际货币基金组织和世界银行的安全网
item.description: 发展中世界正在酝酿一场流动性紧缩，这给美国支持的国际金融机构带来了更大的压力，要求它们帮助穷国偿还不断增加的债务，并推动亟需的投资。【原文：A liquidity crunch is brewing across the developing world, raising pressure on US-backed international financial institutions to help poor nations meet mounting debt repayments and drive much-needed investments.】

item.title: D.R. Horton大跌，因房屋建筑商称买家暂停购买
item.description: D.R. Horton Inc. 公布了令人失望的第四财季业绩报告，并表示经济承受能力方面的挑战阻碍了购房者，此后该公司股价创下四年多来最大跌幅。【原文：D.R. Horton Inc. shares fell the most in more than four years after the homebuilder reported disappointing results for its fiscal fourth quarter and signaled that affordability challenges are holding back buyers.】

item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 美国职位空缺降至2021年初以来最低水平
item.description: 美国 9 月份的职位空缺降至 2021 年初以来的最低点，裁员人数回升，这与劳动力市场放缓的趋势一致。【原文：US job openings fell in September to the lowest since early 2021 and layoffs picked up, consistent with a slowdown in the labor market.】

item.title: 加拿大股市的大幅反弹可能比 S&P 500 指数的反弹更持久
item.description: 多伦多罗森伯格研究公司（Rosenberg Research）认为，今年加拿大股市的涨势可能比美国股市的涨势更长，这将鼓励美国投资者将目光投向北方。【原文：The rally in Canadian stocks this year could run longer than the one going on in US equities, offering encouragement for American investors to look North, according to Toronto’s Rosenberg Research.】

item.title: 得克萨斯大学成立新中心，重点研究公共汽车市场
item.description: 在预期的基础设施投资热潮到来之前，德克萨斯大学奥斯汀分校正在启动一个专门研究市政债券市场的新中心。【原文：The University of Texas at Austin is launching a new center dedicated to the municipal bond market, ahead of an anticipated boom in infrastructure investments.】

item.title: 销售额增长，支出下降，亚马逊印度支付公司亏损收窄
item.description: 亚马逊公司的印度支付部门在截至 3 月 31 日的财年中公布了较小的亏损，因为该部门在削减成本的同时提高了销售额。【原文：Amazon Inc.’s India payments unit posted a smaller loss for the fiscal year ended March 31 as it boosted sales while trimming costs.】

item.title: 软银之子称英伟达价值被低估，超级人工智能迫在眉睫
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）创始人孙正义（Masayoshi Son）表示，在人工智能热潮中市值飙升至 3 万亿美元以上的芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. founder Masayoshi Son said Nvidia Corp. — the chipmaker that’s seen its market value skyrocket to over $3 trillion amid the artificial intelligence boom — is still undervalued, pushing back against the idea of an AI bubble.】

item.title: 华润创业、GoldenTree 收购 Intesa CRE 相关风险转移业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Christofferson Robb & Co.和 GoldenTree Asset Management 公司将投资于 Intesa Sanpaolo SpA 公司的重大风险转移项目，该项目涉及约 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的债务组合。【原文：Christofferson Robb & Co. and GoldenTree Asset Management are set to invest in an Intesa Sanpaolo SpA significant risk transfer that’s linked to a debt portfolio of about €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: TPG 旗下 Exactech 因植入设备召回诉讼而破产
item.description: TPG Capital 旗下的关节置换植入物制造商 Exactech Inc. 在被指控生产有缺陷的髋关节和膝关节植入物伤害患者后，已申请破产。【原文：Exactech Inc., a maker of joint replacement implants owned by TPG Capital, has filed bankruptcy after being accused in lawsuits of making defective hip and knee implants that hurt patients.】

item.title: 据说比亚迪将聘请前 Stellantis 英国公司老板负责欧洲业务拓展
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国比亚迪股份有限公司正在聘用Stellantis NV公司的前英国主管，这家电动汽车制造商正在组建一支欧洲高管团队，以领导其在该地区的扩张。【原文：China’s BYD Co. is hiring the former UK chief of Stellantis NV, according to people familiar with the matter, as the EV maker builds a team of European executives to lead its expansion in the region.】

item.title: 蕾切尔-里夫斯的英国增税预算需要注意什么？
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）为自己设定了看似矛盾的任务：结束公共服务领域的紧缩政策、促进经济增长和实现财政稳定，以向市场保证工党在英国财政方面值得信赖。【原文：Rachel Reeves has set herself the seemingly contradictory tasks of ending austerity in public services, boosting growth and delivering fiscal stability to reassure markets that Labour can be trusted with the UK’s finances.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克与中国生物技术公司达成红斑狼疮交易，金额高达 8.5 亿美元
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）以高达8.5亿美元的价格收购了中国生物技术公司奇美健生物科技公司（Chimagen Biosciences）的一种实验性药物，为这家英国制药商的狼疮潜在治疗产品线增添了新的成员。【原文：GSK Plc acquired an experimental drug from Chinese biotech firm Chimagen Biosciences for as much as $850 million, adding to the British drugmaker’s pipeline of potential treatments for lupus.】

item.title: Blackstone 新直接借贷基金融资 220 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博社看到的一份声明称，Blackstone Inc. 为新的直接借贷基金筹集了约 220 亿美元的资金，包括预期的杠杆作用，该基金以机构投资者为目标。【原文：Blackstone Inc. amassed about $22 billion of capital, including anticipated leverage, for a new direct lending fund targeting institutional investors, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 尼日利亚最大银行计划在国内出售美元证券
item.description: 尼日利亚最大的银行正在考虑在国内市场出售美元证券，以资助其扩张计划并满足中央银行制定的资本规定。【原文：Nigeria’s biggest bank is considering selling dollar-denominated securities in the domestic market to fund its expansion plans and meet capital rules set by the central bank.】
